title: How To Teach Montessori At Home
description:

title: How to start Montessori at home - 5 practical tips for the Montessori parent
description:
Learn how to start Montessori at home with my 5 tips.

Intro 0:14
Tip 1: Observe your child 0:54
Tip 2: Organise your house 1:54
Tip 3: Learn about the child's development stages 2:38
Tip 4: Use what you already have 3:18
Tip 5: Invest in what you really need 3:55


Want to learn more? Here another video "10 Montessori Principles for parents!": 
https://bit.ly/2ZQUi7A

My website: www.themontessorifamily.com

title: Montessori - At Home Set Up
description:
How to set up a Montessori environment in your home.
This tutorial is for parent with children ages 2.5- 6.

title: Setting up your home for Montessori children
description:
Montessori teacher, Simone Davies, walks you through an easy 5-step approach to set up for your home for Montessori children. For more practical tips on how to bring Montessori into your home, visit http://www.themontessorinotebook.com/.

Big thanks to Aida Mussach from http://sensenomproductions.blogspot.nl/ and Ken Rawlinson for filming. Thanks to www.bensound.com for the music.

title: How to set up an activity Montessori-style
description:
Tips from a Montessori teacher, Simone Davies, to help you set up an activity at home so that it is engaging and attractive to your child. For more practical tips on how to use Montessori in your home, visit http://www.themontessorinotebook.com/.

Big thanks to Aida Mussach for filming http://sensenomproductions.blogspot.nl/. And thanks to www.bensound.com for the music.

title: MONTESSORI'S - HOW TO PRONOUNCE IT!?
description:
Watch how to say and pronounce "montessori's"!
Listen our video to compare your pronunciation!
Want to know how other words sound like? Look for maria montesorri, montessori on wordbox channel!

The video is produced by yeta.io.

title: How to Pronounce Montessori - PronounceNames.com
description: Audio and video pronunciation of Montessori brought to you by Pronounce Names (http://www.PronounceNames.com), a website dedicated to helping people pronounce names correctly.
